attributes.action: Make the whole class into one table thus includes all into the education table
attributes.additional_details: The education table has been a great success as we tested work rate behavior all have been improved all for a few individuals let's make it a whole class thing
attributes.background: As gsce get harder we need to up our game as a collective with the help of thy class we can make A* in maths possible for set 2 *also know as* 9x2

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. Please note, you would also have to supply your full name with any further petition, as we are unable to accept petitions if a full name is not supplied.
